job.title: VP-Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
job.description: Job Id: 21332225The deployment automation team at Citi manages a platform that orchestrates releases across a very large number of enterprise applications. This is a mature platform running without major issues and supporting modern deployment strategies like canary, blue-green, containers, microservices, public cloud alongside some more traditional distributed systems and databases.As we expand our continuous delivery product portfolio, we are looking for a SRE, hands-on engineer with experience running platforms as scale leveraging industry observability and automation platforms. Someone who brings fresh ideas, demonstrates a unique and informed viewpoint, and enjoys collaborating with a cross-functional team to develop real-world solutions and positive user experiences at
